targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (le, protocol, signal, status) (rate(icegate_ingest_otlp_request_duration_seconds_seconds_bucket[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, protocol, signal, status) (rate(icegate_ingest_otlp_request_duration_seconds_seconds_bucket[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, protocol, signal, status) (rate(icegate_ingest_otlp_request_duration_seconds_seconds_bucket[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (le, protocol, signal, encoding) (rate(icegate_ingest_otlp_request_size_bytes_bytes_bucket[5m])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, protocol, signal, encoding) (rate(icegate_ingest_otlp_request_size_bytes_bytes_bucket[5m])))

panels.description: Number of batches in the accumulator
panels.title: WAL: pending batches to flush

panels.description: Number of records in the accumulator
panels.title: WAL: pending records to flush

panels.description: Number of segments waiting to be processed
panels.title: WAL: segments backlog [5m]

panels.description: It shows the intensity of planning shift tasks
panels.title: Plan task: planning shift tasks [5m]
Plan task: planned segments per shift task [5m]
Plan task: latency of segment planing and reading

targets.expr:
sum by (topic, status) (rate(icegate_ingest_shift_queue_read_segment_duration_seconds_seconds_sum[5m]))
/
sum by (topic, status) (rate(icegate_ingest_shift_queue_read_segment_duration_seconds_seconds_count[5m]))

panels.title: Shift task: Record batches per task [5m]
Commit task: get parquet files latency [5m]

targets.expr:
(
  sum by (topic, task) (rate(icegate_ingest_shift_task_success_total_total[5m]))
)
/
clamp_min(
  (
    sum by (topic, task) (rate(icegate_ingest_shift_task_success_total_total[5m]))
  ) +
  (
    sum by (topic, task) (rate(icegate_ingest_shift_task_failures_total_total[5m]))
    or
    sum by (topic, task) (rate(icegate_ingest_shift_task_success_total_total[5m])) * 0
  ),
  1e-12
)

(
  sum by (method) (rate(icegate_jobmanager_storage_cache_hits_ratio_total[5m]))
)
/
clamp_min(
  (
    sum by (method) (rate(icegate_jobmanager_storage_cache_hits_ratio_total[5m])) +
    sum by (method) (rate(icegate_jobmanager_storage_cache_misses_ratio_total[5m]))
  ),
  1e-12
)
